meta.note: Short, user-facing summaries paired with practical advice. Keep strings verbatim and offline.

2025.feel: Bold, energized, a bit theatrical; mind is lively but prone to flashy first reads.
2025.why: Leo Sun/Moon boost confidence while Mercury retrograde in Leo increases misreads/logistics risk; Mars in Virgo steadies pacing.
advice: Arrive early; double-check ID, route, and timing.
Underline claim vs. evidence before choosing.
Use a 10-second pause after each passage to slow snap judgments.

2025.feel: Intense focus with a push to act; emotions run deep but productive.
2025.why: Scorpio First Quarter Moon adds drive; Mercury retrograde heightens instruction/tech pitfalls; Mars in Virgo supports precision.
advice: Follow a printed checklist for logistics.
Annotate author’s argument structure line by line.
If stuck >90 seconds, mark and move—return later.

2025.feel: Calm, steady, and methodical; low drama, high consistency.
2025.why: Taurus Moon favors endurance; Mercury now direct reduces friction; Last Quarter lowers raw energy but improves steadiness.
advice: Front-load warm-up to raise activation.
Use predictable pacing blocks (e.g., 9/9/9 minutes).
Prioritize accuracy on the first pass; revisit only flagged items.

2025.feel: Confident and expressive; motivation is high, risk of rushing.
2025.why: Late-Leo cluster boosts confidence and speed; Mars in Libra can hesitate on close calls.
advice: Read stems twice before scanning options.
Set a one-change rule after review.
Keep pre-test social contact minimal to conserve focus.

2025.feel: Fresh start energy with clean mental lines; vibe is organized, not hyped.
2025.why: New Moon reset with Virgo Sun for order; Mercury in Leo adds flair that can overweigh tone.
advice: Do a structured 10-minute warm-up to boost arousal.
Bullet the author’s thesis and 2–3 supports per passage.
If an answer ‘sounds good,’ demand text proof.

2025.feel: Practical and disciplined; attention to detail is strong.
2025.why: Mercury in Virgo + Capricorn Moon → crisp parsing and structure; Saturn retro can feel heavy/perfectionistic.
advice: Cap each question at ~90 seconds.
Favor elimination language (“because X contradicts line…”) in notes.
Plan one short breathing reset per section.

2025.feel: Clear and objective with good mechanical accuracy.
2025.why: Aquarius Moon supports perspective taking; Mercury in Virgo anchors precision.
advice: Use timers to maintain urgency.
Summarize each paragraph in 5 words max.
If torn, choose the option with most textual support, not the cleverest.

2025.feel: Grounded, precise, and calm; less flash, more reliability.
2025.why: Taurus Moon plus Mercury in Virgo favors careful comprehension; Mars in Libra smooths nerves.
advice: Lock answers when ≥70% confident; avoid endless tinkering.
Protect sleep and breakfast routine.
Use elimination first, selection second.

2025.feel: Quick, curious, agile; mind jumps fast between ideas.
2025.why: Gemini Moon boosts verbal agility; Mercury in Virgo keeps accuracy high.
advice: Highlight claim/evidence keywords to prevent thread-hopping.
Channel speed into scanning, not answer changes.
Schedule brief eye-rest every two passages.

2026.why: Capricorn stack emphasizes structure and stamina; Virgo Moon favors meticulous review.
advice: Use a rigid pacing grid and stick to it.
Predefine when to guess/skip to avoid time debt.
Insert micro-breaks to prevent mental heaviness.

2026.why: Capricorn focus with Libra Moon eases anxiety and supports fairness.
advice: If split 50/50, decide within 20 seconds to avoid drift.
Mark one revisit max per passage.
Keep posture/breath steady to maintain rhythm.

2026.feel: Methodical with a wider lens; can feel sticky at moments.
2026.why: Capricorn planning meets Sagittarius Moon big-picture; Saturn station can slow transitions.
advice: Write a one-line thesis per passage.
If you feel ‘stuck,’ switch questions then return.
Guard detail loss by underlining key terms.

2026.feel: Analytical with soft empathy; clear but not harsh.
2026.why: Aquarius planets aid abstraction; Pisces Moon boosts tone sensitivity.
advice: Translate each paragraph into a neutral claim.
Use timers to avoid dreamy drift.
When two answers fit tone, pick the one with tighter evidence.

2026.feel: Structured but stop-start; clarity improves after warm-up.
2026.why: Capricorn Moon grounds execution; Saturn station direct can feel choppy initially.
advice: Do a 12-minute ramp-up set before exam.
Front-load easier items to build flow.
Keep notes compact—subject, verb, claim.

2026.feel: Fluid and collaborative in your own head; good for inference.
2026.why: Pisces Mercury aids contextual reading; Libra Moon stabilizes reviews.
advice: Anchor each inference to a line reference.
Write mini-summaries after each paragraph.
Use ‘prove it’ checks on feel-good choices.

2026.feel: Decisive and competitive; energy is high.
2026.why: Aries Moon brings momentum near equinox edge.
advice: Count to three before locking fast answers.
Fuel/hydrate to avoid late-section dips.
Mark and move when encountering sticky stems.

2026.feel: Driven start with steady finishing power.
2026.why: Aries Sun/Mars give launch energy; Capricorn Moon anchors pacing.
advice: Open with a medium-difficulty passage to harness momentum.
Check first sentences for thesis cues.
Plan one posture reset mid-section.

2026.why: Aquarius Moon boosts detachment; Aries energy sustains pace.
advice: If confidence outruns evidence, re-read the claim line.
Use a strict mark-and-move rule.
Keep transitions tight—no lingering.

2026.why: Taurus Sun favors consistency; Leo Moon supplies presence; Mercury Aries can jump ahead.
advice: Slow the first 3 questions of each passage deliberately.
Change answers only with new evidence.
Use margin notes to police assumptions.

2026.why: Leo Moon + Mercury Aries quicken choices; Venus in Gemini eases verbal flow.
advice: Insert 5-second pauses before ‘obvious’ picks.
Break long paragraphs into claim/evidence bullets.
Micro-pause every two pages to prevent over-speed.

2026.why: Scorpio Moon sustains focus; Aries Mercury sharpens takeaways.
advice: Zoom out after each paragraph to avoid tunnel vision.
Flag emotionally charged passages for a second, cooler look.
Protect energy with brief box breathing at breaks.

2026.why: Earth emphasis (Taurus/Capricorn) supports stability and elimination.
advice: Use elimination statements (“contradicts line 12”).
Set checkpoints every 8–9 minutes.
Don’t hunt perfect certainty—choose the most supported.

2026.why: Aquarius Moon supports synthesis; Taurus Mercury keeps edges clear.
advice: Re-read stems that feel ‘too easy.’
Map each answer to a specific sentence.
Keep tempo brisk to avoid late squeeze.

2026.why: Aries Moon speeds activation; Taurus Mercury reduces careless errors.
advice: Draft a 1-line thesis before options.
Throttle speed on dense humanities passages.
Timebox any single question to 90 seconds.

2026.feel: Talkative mind, clear summaries, confident choices.
2026.why: Gemini Sun/Mercury drive verbal flow; Leo Moon adds assertiveness.
advice: Read tone words twice; avoid skimming.
Silence test room distractions with permitted aids.
Summarize each passage in 12 words max.

2026.feel: Curious yet composed; depth when needed.
2026.why: Gemini Mercury speeds parsing; Scorpio Moon supports deep inference.
advice: Use passage maps: thesis, supports, counterpoints.
Avoid over-digging where text is thin.
Reset attention at section mid-point.

2026.why: Taurus Moon + Cancer Mercury aid endurance and detail recall.
advice: Lean on line references to justify picks.
Guard against sentimental bias—stick to evidence.
Plan nutrition to avoid post-noon dip.

2026.why: Taurus Moon steadies; Cancer Mercury helps recall across long passages.
advice: Use checkpoint timers to maintain pace.
Limit reviews to flagged items only.
Keep posture open to sustain alertness.

2026.feel: Intense but productive; emotions can fuel focus.
2026.why: Cancer Sun/Mercury memory boost; Scorpio Moon deep work.
advice: Name the author’s purpose explicitly in notes.
If triggered by content, breathe then re-anchor to text.
Schedule a short reset between sections.

2026.feel: Expansive and confident, with quick decisions.
2026.why: Sagittarius Moon lifts optimism; Cancer Mercury supports detail recall.
advice: Force a second read on nuanced stems.
Use a hard stop for answer changes.
Keep hydration steady to sustain pace.

2026.why: Gemini Moon aids pivots; Cancer Mercury preserves fine detail.
advice: Anchor each choice to a line number.
Clamp context switching with brief note headers.
Use mini-breaks to keep attention fresh.

2026.why: Leo Sun boosts courage; Scorpio Moon favors digging into arguments.
advice: Demand explicit textual proof before locking.
Avoid debating the passage—analyze it.
Protect energy from others’ stress pre-test.

2026.why: Aquarius Moon promotes fairness; Leo Sun sustains drive.
advice: Re-engage with author voice if feeling detached.
When two answers fit, prefer the one with tighter evidence.
Keep a steady cadence across passages.

2026.why: Virgo Moon tidies thinking; Leo Mercury clarifies summaries; Venus Libra eases nerves.
advice: Timebox reviews to avoid perfectionism.
Use concise margin symbols (T=thesis, E=evidence).
Lights out early the night before.

2026.feel: Fast and clear with upbeat drive.
2026.why: Sagittarius Moon speeds decisions; Leo Mercury sharpens articulation.
advice: Insert deliberate slows on tricky inference items.
Use breath resets when excitement spikes.
Stick to your pacing grid.

2026.why: Late-Leo/Sag mix favors quick synthesis and bold choices.
advice: Require a quoted support for each selection.
Plan water and micro-breathing cadence.
If racing, count to three before locking.

2026.why: Virgo Sun/Mercury with Taurus Moon emphasizes accuracy and consistent pacing.
advice: Set max 90 seconds per question.
Use elimination phrased as evidence checks.
Release tension between passages with posture resets.

2026.why: Gemini Moon boosts agility; Mercury in Virgo keeps structure tight.
advice: Annotate claims vs. support to prevent hopping.
Avoid premature answer changes.
Keep tempo brisk to finish with review time.

2026.feel: Disciplined study flow with clean handoffs.
2026.why: Double Virgo structure; Mercury at 0° Libra aids balance.
advice: Set ‘good-enough’ thresholds to prevent loops.
Weigh options explicitly against the thesis.
Don’t over-index tone without text.

2026.why: Libra Moon/Mercury help perspective-taking; Virgo Sun keeps mechanics tight.
advice: Limit revisits to a single pass.
When pulled by emotion, return to quoted lines.
Use tie-break questions: ‘Which is most text-bounded?’
